    • addStation

      @PUT @Path("/station") @Consumes("application/json") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response addStation​(@QueryParam("value") java.lang.String jsonStation)
      Method for adding a new station to the server
      Parameters:
      jsonStation - name of the new station to create;
      Returns:
      201 created if success, 500 internal Server.

    • deleteStation

      @DELETE @Path("/station") @Consumes("application/json") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response deleteStation​(@QueryParam("value") java.lang.String name)
      Method for deleting an station.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the station to be deleted.
      Returns:
      202 accepted or 500 internal server error.

    • connectStations

      @PUT @Path("/route") @Consumes("text/plain") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response connectStations​(@QueryParam("start") java.lang.String starting, @QueryParam("end") java.lang.String ending, @QueryParam("km") int weight)
      Method for connecting two stations
      Parameters:
      starting - name of the starting point
      ending - name of the ending point
      weight - distance fo the two stations
      Returns:
      Created if success, internal server code if error.

    • deleteConnection

      @DELETE @Consumes("application/json") @Path("/route") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response deleteConnection​(@QueryParam("start") java.lang.String st1, @QueryParam("end") java.lang.String st2)
      Method for deleting the connection between two stations.
      Parameters:
      st1 - name of the station the connection starts from
      st2 - name of the station the connection ends in.
      Returns:
      Response, code 202 if success, 500 internal server error if trouble.

      @GET @Produces("text/plain") @Path("/percentage") public java.lang.String disc​(@QueryParam("num") int amount, @QueryParam("price") int price)
